entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
